pages.text:
COURSE INFORMATION
Chestatee Golf Club is known for its challenging and unique design; each hole has been carefully routed to take advantage of the mountainous terrain while protecting the land’s natural environment.
The first hole plays from an elevated tee box to a comfortable landing area. On this dogleg right Par 5, a well-placed tee shot leaves the challenge of making it to the green in two. Chestatee’s signature par 3, 17th hole offers a beautiful view of the Chestatee River before it meets Lake Lanier, while Hole 8 has been dubbed one of the most challenging Par 4s in the state.
Chestatee provides plenty of challenge for high caliber players, however the course can be fun for players of all skill levels, with 5 sets of tees to choose from.
Per current guidelines, we allow one (1) cart for two (2) players with a maximum of two (2) carts per tee time. Regardless of circumstances, we do not guarantee one (1) cart for one (1) player if requested. Golf shop staff will have final say in determining number of carts allowed per group/tee time.
Call 706.216.7336 Today to Book Your Tee Time

TOURNAMENTS
&
EVENTS
Chestatee’s unsurpassed views create the perfect setting for any golf outing. Chestatee’s clubhouse features beautiful picture windows and an amazing porch overlooking the course. The club also offers a full-service bar and allows outside catering for your event.
Our guests have the opportunity to customize their events, down to every detail.
Tournament services include:
Personalized scorecards and cart fronts
Skirted registration tables and PA system
Trained cart attendants with bag valet from the parking lot to players’ carts
Marshals and starters
Beverage carts on the course
Tournament food menus are available. Outside food must be pre-approved
For more information fill out the form below or please contact our General Manager Wendy Merry at Wendy.Merry@ChestateeGolfClub or 706.216.7336.
We are currently hosting golf related events only.
